name: 甘奈
text:
空いてる席、すぐ見つかって良かったよね☆
思ったよりゆっくりできそうで嬉しいなー
trans: Glad we could find an empty table so easily! It looks like we can take our time even more than we thought, so I'm glad.

name: 甜花
text:
いつもは……混んでる……みたい、だけど……
狙い目の時間帯……あるって……
trans:
It seems like... it usually... is more crowded, but...
They say that there's... a perfect timeslot...

name: 甜花
text:
できたばっか……だけど、
人気のお店……だし……
trans: It just opened... but, it's a popular shop... so...

name: 甜花
text: 甜花……ネットで、調べてきた……
trans: Tenka... researched, online...

name: 千雪
text:
そうだったのね。ありがとう、甜花ちゃん♪
おかげでじっくり堪能できそう
trans: Is that so? Thank you, Tenka. Thanks to you it seems like we'll be able to enjoy this at our leisure.

name: 甘奈
text: そうだよそうだよ、甘奈からもありがとっ！
trans: That's exactly right, I thank you as well!

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe...

name: 甜花
text:
……ここなら……
なーちゃんが気に入るのも……きっと……ある……
trans:
...if it's here...
There'll be something Na-chan... likes... for sure...

name: 甜花
text: もちろん……千雪さんが、好きそうなのも……！
trans: Of course... Something that, Chiyuki might also like...!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、ほんとう！
どこから見てこうか迷っちゃうな
trans:
Fufu, really!
I don't even know where to start looking.

name: 甘奈
text: あっ、その気持ちわかる～
trans: Ah, I know how you feel.

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈、ここみたいに本棚がズラーって並んでるの見ると
ワクワクしちゃうもん
trans: When I see bookshelves lined up like this, I get really excited.

name: 甘奈
text:
どんな本があるのかなー、とか、
お楽しみが詰まってる感じ☆
trans: Like, what kinds of books are there, it's like getting stuck from the anticipation!

name: 甜花
text: ……にへへ……
trans: ...Nihehe...

name: 甜花
text:
……えっと……甜花、向こう、回ってくるね……
なーちゃんと千雪さんも、ゆっくり見てて……
trans:
...Erm... Tenka will look around, over there...
Na-chan and Chiyuki, take your time to look around...

name: 甘奈
text:
オッケー☆
じゃあまた後でね、甜花ちゃん！
trans:
OK!
Then, see you later, Tenka!

name: 甘奈
text:
これ、この間テレビで紹介してた小説だ
なんかね、すっごく泣けるお話なんだって！
trans:
This, it's the novel that was introduced on TV.
Apparently it's a real tear-jerker!

name: 甘奈
text:
前から読みたかったんだ～
席に持ってっちゃおっかなー☆
trans:
I've been wanting to read this for a while.
Maybe I should bring it back to the desk!

name: 甘奈
text:
……あ！　買いそびれてたやつもある！
どーしよ、新しい方の中身も気になるし……
trans:
...Ah! They even have the one I missed out buying!
What to do, I'm also curious about the new one...

name: 千雪
text:
待ち時間なんかに、ファッション誌を読んでるところは
見たことあったけど……
trans: I've seen you reading a fashion magazine while we were waiting but...

name: 千雪
text: 甘奈ちゃんはこういう本も読んでるのね
trans: So you read books like these too.

name: 甘奈
text: えへへー……やっぱ意外って感じ、する？
trans: Ehehe... As expected, is this surprising?

name: 甘奈
text:
最近は時間がなくてあんまりなんだけど、
前は本屋さんとか、こういうところにも来てたんだー
trans: Recently there hasn't been a lot of time, but in the past I went to bookstores and even places like this!

name: 甘奈
text:
家の近くにね、ここと比べたら隠れ家って感じなんだけど、
静かで、のんびりできるお店があるの
trans: Near our house there's a shop that feels like a hideout compared to this one, it's a quiet place where you can relax.

name: 甘奈
text: 学校帰りとかに、ちょーっと寄ってみたり
trans: I often drop by for a little while on the way home after school.

name: 千雪
text: ……そっかぁ。本が好きなの？
trans: ...I see. Do you like books?

name: 甘奈
text: うーん……そういうわけでもないんだけど……
trans: Hmm... that's not really the case...

name: 甘奈
text:
……なんだろ……たまに思い切って、
難しい本とか、読んでみたりしてたかな
trans: ...how to put it... sometimes I will just go all out and try to read a difficult book or something.

name: 甘奈
text:
内容はわからないはずなのに……
開くとね、どの本もキラキラして見えたの
trans: Even if I might not be able to understand the contents... When it's opened, any book will look like it's sparkling.

name: 甘奈
text:
……甘奈、やりたいこととか、将来の夢とか
あんまりなかったから
trans: ...because I don't really have something I want to do or have any aspirations about.

name: 甘奈
text:
だから……多分、そういう体験が、
……楽しかったんだよね
trans:
That's why... maybe, it's fun...
to experience something like that.

name: 千雪
text: ……素敵
trans: ...I see.

name: 千雪
text:
甘奈ちゃんはきっと、本と出会う時に、
その本を書いた人とも出会えちゃうのね
trans: It must be that for you, when you encounter a book, you also meet the book's author.

name: 甘奈
text: そ、そうなのかな……？
trans: I-Is that so...?

name: 千雪
text:
ええ、きっと
……ね、甘奈ちゃん。私も今日は素敵な出会いがしたいな
trans: Yes, for sure... Say, Amana, I want to have a lovely encounter today.

name: 千雪
text: 何かおすすめ、教えてもらえない？
trans: Can you recommend me something?

name: 甘奈
text:
えっ？　えーっと……千雪さんだったら……
……そうだなー……これとか！
trans:
Eh? Erm... if it's for you...
...Let's see... maybe this?

name: 千雪
text: わぁ、和小物の本ね！
trans: Wow, it's a book on Japanese trinkets!

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さんの雑貨って洋風なイメージだから、
たまにはこっち路線もいいかな？　と思って。……どう？
trans: Chiyuki's sundries store has a western style, so maybe trying this once in awhile might be nice... What do you think?

name: 千雪
text:
──すごい……
自分で作る時にも参考になりそう……
trans: It seems like this might be a good reference for when I make them myself...

name: 甜花
text: ……あ……ふたりとも、いた……
trans: ...Ah... there you, two are...

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん！
いいの見つかった？
trans:
Tenka!
Did you find anything nice?

name: 甜花
text:
本は……まだ、だけど……
千雪さんに、見せたいの、あって……
trans:
Not yet... for books, but...
There is something, Tenka wants to show, Chiyuki...

name: 千雪
text: 私に？　何かしら
trans: Show me? I wonder what it is.

name: 甜花
text:
その本の……表紙みたいな、飾り……
向こうに、あった……
trans:
Ornaments... like the one, on the book cover...
There were some, over there...

name: 甘奈
text: そっか、こういうとこって雑貨も置いてたりするもんね
trans: Oh right, they have a sundries store around here.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……あの、だから……
行って……みない……？
trans:
Yeah... erm, that's why...
Want to... have a look...?

name: 千雪
text:
ぜひ！
ありがとう、甜花ちゃん♪
trans:
Of course!
Thank you, Tenka♪

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……
trans: Nihehe...

name: 千雪
text: わぁ……！
trans: Wow...!

name: 甘奈
text: すごーい！　かわいーの、いっぱいあるね☆
trans: Amazing! They have a lot of cute ones!

name: 千雪
text:
これ……素敵……！
私、こういう花の飾りが大好きなの……！
trans:
This is... lovely...!
I really love flower ornaments like this...!

name: 甘奈
text:
ホントだ、千雪さんに似合いそう！
ねぇねぇ、着けてみようよ？
trans:
You're right, it looks like it'll suit Chiyuki!
Hey hey, why don't you try it on?

name: 千雪
text: うん、それじゃあ……
trans: Yeah, well then...

name: 甜花
text:
ふわ……
千雪さん、綺麗……！
trans:
Wow...
Chiyuki is so pretty...!

name: 千雪
text: きっと飾りが可愛いからね
trans: It must be because the ornament is so cute.

name: 甘奈
text: そんなことないよー！
trans: That's not true!

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、ううん、飾りはもちろんかわいーけど、
千雪さんだってかわいーもん☆
trans: Ah, no, of course the ornament is cute but, Chiyuki is really cute too!

name: 千雪
text: ふふ、甘奈ちゃん……
trans:
Fufu,
Amana...

name: 千雪
text: あのね、このお花の飾りは、『つまみ』っていうの
trans: See, this flower ornament is called a "Tsumami"

name: 千雪
text:
布をつまんで作るからこういう名前がついたんだけど、
もともとは、江戸時代から伝わってる細工なんだ
trans: It got it's name from the process of making it by pinching cloth together. Originally it's a craft that's been passed down from the Edo period.

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……雑貨の、先生……
trans: Chiyuki... is a sundries teacher...

name: 甘奈
text:
やっぱりすごいなあ～☆
それに、その飾りのことも大好きって感じ！
trans:
She's amazing as expected!
Also, it feels like she really loves the ornament!

name: 甘奈
text: 千雪さん、買わないの？
trans: Chiyuki, you're not buying it?

name: 千雪
trans: Hmm...

name: 千雪
text:
……買っちゃいたいけど……
今日はそんなつもりじゃなかったし……
trans:
...I want to buy it but...
I didn't plan to buy anything today...

name: 千雪
text: ……みんなで、本選びに戻りましょうか
trans: ...Let's all go back to choosing our books.

name: 甘奈
text: ええー、すっごくかわいーのに
trans: Ehh, even though it's so cute.

name: 甜花
text: ……もったい、ない……
trans: ...Such a waste...

name: 千雪
text: ううん、いいの！
trans: No, it's fine!

name: 千雪
text:
それより……ちょっとはしゃいじゃった
ごめんなさい……！
trans:
That aside... I got a little too excited.
I'm sorry...!

name: 千雪
text: ……あら、もうこんな時間
trans: ...My, look at the time.

name: 甘奈
text:
わ、ホントだー！
さすがにそろそろ帰らなきゃだよね？
trans:
Ah, you're right!
We have to make our way back don't we?

name: 甜花
text:
じゃあ……
甜花……本、戻してくるね……
trans:
Then... Tenka...
will go return the books...

name: 千雪
text: 私たちも支度しなきゃね、甘奈ちゃん
trans: We should prepare to go back as well, Amana.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん──
……ねぇ、千雪さん
trans:
Yeah──
...say, Chiyuki.

name: 甘奈
text:
千雪さん……きっと、甘奈と甜花ちゃんが行きたいところを
優先してくれたんだよね
trans: Chiyuki... you prioritized the places that Amana and Tenka wanted to go to didn't you?

name: 甘奈
text: 小物とかも……もっと見たかったよね
trans: You must have wanted to... look at more accessories and stuff.

name: 千雪
text:
何言ってるの、甘奈ちゃん
全然そんなことないのよ
trans:
Why are you saying that, Amana?
That's not true at all.

name: 甘奈
text: 帰りがけにもう１回、雑貨のコーナー寄っていく？
trans: Before we go, wanna drop by the sundries corner one more time?

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、大丈夫
ありがとう、甘奈ちゃん♪
trans:
No, it's alright.
Thank you, Amana.

name: 甘奈
text: ……こちらこそありがとう、千雪さん
trans: ...We should be the ones thanking you, Chiyuki.

name: 甘奈
text:
──よーし、甘奈も片付けてこよーっと☆
甜花ちゃん、待ってー！
trans:
Alriiight, I'll pack up too.
Tenka, wait up!

name: 千雪
text: ……ふふ
trans: ...Fufu.

name: 千雪
text: すっかり遅くなっちゃったね
trans: It's very late already.

name: 甘奈
text:
楽しい時間ってあっという間なんだもーん……
もうちょっといられたら良かったのに～
trans:
Time flies so quickly when you're having fun...
If only we could stay a little longer.

name: 甜花
text: ……なーちゃん……楽しかった……？
trans: Na-chan... did you have fun...?

name: 甘奈
text: うん！　すっごく☆
trans: Yeah! Lots of fun!

name: 甘奈
text:
ほらっ、この前話してた小説がね、
読んでみたら思った以上の超大作で……！
trans: See, the novel I told you about, after reading it, it was even more of a masterpiece...!

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃんにも絶対おすすめって感じだったよ☆
trans: It's definitely something I would recommend to you.

name: 甜花
text: にへへ……すごそう……
trans: Nihehe... it sounds amazing...

name: 甘奈
text:
今度、続きとあわせて買ってくるから、
一緒に読もう？
trans: Next time, I'll buy it together with the sequel, let's read it together alright?

name: 甜花
text: うん、楽しみ……！
trans: Yeah, looking forward to it...!
